name: Rolling Atop It
description:
a Ball Rolling Game Of Epic Proportions!



Roll into to levels to gain access to better graphics, more mechanics, and higher-skill gameplay! We expect nothing less than perfection... at least at the end!

features:

these are already going to be in the final release of the game.
  • At least 3 levels of gameplay, each with increasingly good graphics (and soon, settings to turn them back to older graphics for performance)
  • Good music composed by the developers (and potentially, the community)
  • Trading Cards that will be posted as restrictions allow

coming Soon:

these are potential features, nothing is set in stone
  • Different Tilesets
  • Workshop compatibility
  • Level Editor
  • Clear ball with image inside
  • Voice-Activation Mod (For Streamers who want this to be harder)
